property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Put 2 of them into your hand and put 3 seals on this creature. Forbidden Mechanism: When this creature becomes unsealed, take an extra turn after this one. (When you seal a card, put the top card of your deck on that card face down. Whenever a Command is put into the battle zone, its owner puts a seal from one of his cards that has the same civilization as that Command into his graveyard. While a creature is sealed, both players ignore that creature)

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) ZERO: At the end of your opponent's turn, if your opponent put a creature into the battle zone for no cost, you may put this creature from your hand into the battle zone for no cost. Whenever this creature attacks, if you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has the highest power.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Revolution Change: Light or Water Dragon that costs 5 or more Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may cast a light spell that costs 5 or less from your hand for no cost. If you don't, draw a card. Final Revolution - If you put this creature into the battle zone through 'Revolution Change' and you didn't use 'Final Revolution' during this turn, until the end of your opponent's next turn, your opponent can't summon creatures that cost 7 or less.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature costs 1 less to summon for each card in your opponent's shield zone. It can't cost 0 or less. ​​ {BLOCKER} Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) During your turn, whenever your opponent's creatures are tapped, if you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, that creature doesn't untap at the start of their turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top 2 cards of your deck. From among them you may put a non-evolution creature that costs 6 or less into the battle zone. Put the rest to the bottom of your deck in any order. If you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, each of your creatures get the Sonic Command race.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This creature is put into the battle zone tapped. If you don't have a D2 Field in the battle zone at the start of your turn, this creature doesn't untap. Whenever this creature untaps, each of your creatures get +5000 power and breaks an additional shield until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​​ {BLOCKER} ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Creatures that have 'speed attacker' can't attack on the turn they are put into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) Revolution Change - Light or Nature dragon that costs 5 or more(When one of your light or nature dragons that costs 5 or more attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may choose a D2 Field from your mana zone and put it into the battle zone. If you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, nobody can put a D2 Field into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) This creature can't be blocked. Mana Arms 4: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 4 or more multicolored cards in your mana zone, shuffle your hand into your deck, then draw 4 cards. Then your opponent chooses a card from your hand. Reveal it. If it's a creature, you may put it into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever this creature attacks, destroy one of your opponent's creatures that has power less than this creature. Then choose a creature that has power less than this creature from your graveyard and put it into the battle zone. If you have a Forbidden Field in the battle zone, this creature gets +90000 power and has 'triple breaker'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Slayer Double breaker Revolution Change - Darkness or Fire Dragon(When one of your darkness or fire Dragons attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) When this creature is put into your graveyard from anywhere, if you have a D2 Field in the battle zone, return it to your hand.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Fire or Nature dragon that costs 5 or more(When one of your fire or nature dragons that costs 5 or more attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, search your deck. You may choose a multicolored Dragon, show it to your opponent and put it into your hand. Then shuffle your deck.

property.name: Rules
Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, look at the top card of your deck. If the cost of the card is odd, draw 5 cards. When you would lose the game or your opponent would win the game, reveal the top card of your deck instead. If the cost of the card is odd, draw 5 cards. If the cost of the card is even, you lose the game. If you have 10 or more cards in your hand, this creature gets +10000 power, 'Quattro Breaker' and can't be blocked.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then put a creature that costs 1, a creature that costs 2 and a creature that costs 3 from your graveyard into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Speed attacker(This creature doesn't get summoning sickness) Triple breaker(This creature breaks 3 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, destroy all your opponent's creatures that have 'blocker'. Then for each creature destroyed, break one of your opponent's shields.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) When you put this creature into the battle zone, you may tap this creature. When your opponent's creatures attack, they must attack this creature if able. If you have 6 or more cards in your mana zone, this creature gets 'Shield Trigger'. When this creature is destroyed, you may put a nature creature that costs 6 or less from your mana zone into the battle zone.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This spell is put into your mana zone tapped) Until the end of your opponent's next turn, your opponent's creatures can't attack, block or untap. You may cast a light spell that costs 4 or less from your hand for no cost. After you cast this spell, put it on the bottom of your deck instead.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​​ {BLOCKER} ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever you put a multicolored card into the battle zone, you may draw a card. Whenever you put a multicolored card into your mana zone, you may draw a card.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) Revolution Change - Water or Darkness Dragon (When one of your water or darkness dragons attack, you may switch that creature with this creature from your hand) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Whenever your opponent draws a card, he may discard a card. If he doesn't, you may draw 2 cards.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Slayer(Whenever this creature battles, destroy the other creature after the battle) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Mana Arms 4: When you put this creature into the battle zone, if you have 4 or more multicolored cards in your mana zone, you may put a creature that costs 5 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone. Then each of your creatures gets 'speed attacker' until the end of the turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: (This creature is put into your mana zone tapped) ​Double breaker(This creature breaks 2 shields) Each of your Giants gets 'speed attacker' and 'power attacker +3000'.

property.name: Rules
property.value: ​ {SHIELD TRIGGER} When you put this creature into the battle zone, add the top card of your deck to your shields face down. At the start of your next turn, put a shield from your shields to your hand. You can't use the 'Shield Trigger' ability of that shield.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Until the end of your opponent's next turn, your opponent can't cast spells. Draw a card.
